Dr. Nicola McFadden-Marvin
Dr. Nicola McFadden-Marvin
posts.content:
Thank You for an Incredible 21 Days of the Daniel Fast: Closing the GAP! 

Dear Beloved Daniel Fast Tribe,

Wow! What a powerful and transformative 21 days we have journeyed together! Pastor John and I are extremely grateful, humbled, and honored by your commitment to this sacred time of fasting, prayer, and spiritual alignment.

Your dedication to growing in intimacy with God, aligning with your purpose, and stepping boldly into your calling has been inspiring and life-changing. We have prayed for personal transformation, generational blessings, and a global revival‚Äîand we believe that God is moving mightily in each of your lives!

 Next Steps: Breaking Your Fast with Wisdom

As you transition from the fast, we encourage you to do so prayerfully and with intention. Use the 6F Plan to maintain the discipline, habits, and spiritual momentum you have gained.

 Stay Connected & Keep Growing!

The fast may be over, but the journey continues! Stay plugged into our community, engage in upcoming events and programs, and access resources to help you continue your growth and walk in purpose.

 Ways to Stay Engaged:
Ô∏è Join our community & discussions
Ô∏è Engage in upcoming events & programs
Ô∏è Access valuable resources & mentorship
Ô∏è Partner with us & sow into the vision to help expand the reach of this movement and continue equipping believers globally.

From the bottom of our hearts, thank you for walking this journey with us. This is only the beginning‚ÄîGod has greater things ahead for you! Let‚Äôs keep growing, believing, and moving boldly in faith.

With love & gratitude,

 Pastor John & Niki
 Chayah Leadership Team

posts.name:
Romi Mahajan
Romi Mahajan
posts.content:
A note for those in the fusion community-- especially for fusion industry executives who are not scientists. No fronting here. To be able to be part of this industry and to learn daily from the scientists and engineers, the innovators and dreamers, is truly a reward in and of itself. We have a long way to go but we've also made huge progress.

With regard to, the company of which I'm lucky enough to be CEO, a very special thanks to Dr. Mike Kotschenreuther, Dr. Swadesh Mahajan, and Dr.. Blown away every day.

And a thanks to our customers, partners, investors, collaborators and well-wishers.

Most of all, thanks to the geniuses who are working on fusion everyday to usher in a new era of energy.
posts.commentAdded: Incredible insights! Its inspiring to witness such collaboration in the fusion community. Excited for the progress ahead! #FusionEnergy

posts.content:
NGT360  Calling All Innovators, Entrepreneurs, and Business Leaders! 
Are you ready to make an impact and inspire the next generation of tech and business leaders? NGT360 is searching for Mini-Sharks to join our upcoming workshops on 1/28, 2/11, and 2/25 from 6:45‚Äì8 PM at One Urban Centre, Tampa.
 What‚Äôs a Mini-Shark?
Mini-Sharks are professionals who bring their expertise, insights, and passion to help high school students refine their business pitches and entrepreneurial ideas. Your role is to provide constructive feedback, inspire young innovators, and share your knowledge to guide the next wave of changemakers!
 Hear from a Mini-Shark: Check out what he has to say about his experience and why YOU should join: Watch here:
Criteria for Mini-Sharks
 Professional Expertise: Strong background in entrepreneurship, technology, business strategy, venture capital, accessibility, or innovation.
 Commitment to Student Growth: Passion for mentoring young adults, providing actionable advice, and fostering student growth.
 Evaluative Skills: Ability to assess business ideas critically and communicate feedback in a way that empowers students.
 Program Engagement: Availability to attend workshops and events, along with a commitment to the program‚Äôs mission of inspiring young innovators.
 Advocacy for Inclusivity: Support for accessibility-focused themes, including our ‚ÄúDifferently Abled‚Äù initiatives.
 Bonus: Mini-Sharks contribute $100 per event to support NGT360 and its mission.
Ready to inspire and be inspired? Let‚Äôs work together to shape the future of innovation and entrepreneurship!
 Dates: 1/28, 2/11, and 2/25
 Location: One Urban Centre, Tampa
‚è∞ Time: 6:45‚Äì8 PM
 Interested? Comment below or reach out to join our team of impactful Mini-Sharks!
posts.commentAdded: Exciting opportunity to shape young minds! Thrilled to see innovators coming together to inspire the next generation. Count me in! üåü #MiniShark
